content: picot ice cream pint holder crochet pattern <3 please note this is the ad-free easy to print pdf version of this pattern you can find a free version of this pattern on my website www theturtletrunk com difficulty easy materials needed - 5 50 mm i hook - bulky 5 weight yarn i used 1 2oz of bernat maker home decor for each holder - scissors yarn needle tape measure patterns will be available for immediate download once payment is received pattern will download in pdf format you will receive an email following your payment with download instructions including a link if you do not receive your pattern within 24 hours please message me and i d be happy to personally email you a copy you are more than welcome to sell your finished items but please give the turtle trunk credit as pattern designer and link back to my shop www etsy com/shop/theturtletrunk if you have any questions about this pattern please feel free to message me my patterns including all photographs are copyrighted you may not copy re-distribute or sell my pattern due to the electronic nature of this pattern we cannot offer refunds or exchanges
